text:
="preserve">Marie-Claude Vayssade (8 August 1936 – 11 November 2020) was a French politician. She was a member of the European Parliament from 1979 to 1994. Vayssade was a member of the Socialist Party. She was born in Pierrepont, France.
Vayssade died on 11 November 2020 in Vandœuvre-lès-Nancy, France at the age of 84.
